params.name: language
params.description: The language of the model (if applicable)

params.name: license
params.description: The license of the model. Will default to the license of the pretrained model used, if the originalmodel given to the Trainer comes from a repo on the Hub.

params.name: tags
params.description: Some tags to be included in the metadata of the model card.

params.name: finetuned_from
params.description: The name of the model used to fine-tune this one (if applicable). Will default to the name of the repoof the original model given to the Trainer (if it comes from the Hub).

params.name: tasks
params.description: One or several task identifiers, to be included in the metadata of the model card.

params.name: dataset_tags
params.description: One or several dataset tags, to be included in the metadata of the model card.

params.name: dataset
params.description: One or several dataset identifiers, to be included in the metadata of the model card.

params.name: dataset_args
params.description: One or several dataset arguments, to be included in the metadata of the model card.
